cli.app_description: Documentation generator for Azure Bicep files
cli.app_about: Parse Azure Bicep files and export documentation in a range of formats
cli.verbose_help: Set the verbosity level of output (v: debug, vv: trace)
cli.log_format_help: Set the format for logging output
cli.log_file_help: Path to a file to write logs to (instead of stdout/stderr)
cli.language_help: Set the language for CLI messages and generated documentation
cli.markdown_command_desc: Document Bicep file in Markdown format
cli.asciidoc_command_desc: Document Bicep file in AsciiDoc format
cli.yaml_command_desc: Document Bicep file in YAML format
cli.json_command_desc: Document Bicep file in JSON format
cli.input_help: Path to the Bicep file to parse
cli.output_help: Output file path. Defaults to input filename with appropriate extension.
cli.emoji_help: Enable emoji usage in documentation output
cli.exclude_empty_help: Skip exporting empty sections in the documentation
cli.check_help: Check if generated documentation matches existing file and exit with appropriate code
cli.pretty_help: Format JSON with indentation for readability
